alert.note: Alert for San Bernardino County-Upper Colorado River Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 04 at 8:11AM PST until January 04 at 10:00AM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST /11 AM MST/ THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility 1/4 mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...In Arizona, Lake Havasu and Fort Mohave. In California, San Bernardino County-Upper Colorado River Valley. * WHEN...Until 10 AM PST /11 AM MST/ this morning. * IMPACTS...Low visibility could make driving conditions hazardous.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: San Bernardino County-Upper Colorado River Valley
